Module kivakit.network.core
Package com.telenav.kivakit.network.core

Class Port

java.lang.Object
com.telenav.kivakit.network.core.Port
All Implemented Interfaces:
com.telenav.kivakit.core.string.AsString, com.telenav.kivakit.interfaces.string.AsString, com.telenav.kivakit.interfaces.string.StringFormattable
public class Port extends Object implements com.telenav.kivakit.core.string.AsString
A host, port and protocol. The port has a number, accessible with portNumber(), it exists on a Host and it speaks a given protocol().

  • port(URI)

  • Method Details

    • parsePort

      public static Port parsePort(com.telenav.kivakit.core.messaging.Listener listener, String port)
      Parses a port of the form "[host]:[port-number]". If the port number is omitted, port 80 is assumed.
      Returns:
      A port for the given string or null if the string is not a port

    • port

      public static Port port(URI uri)

      Returns a switch parser builder for parsing ports
      Parameters:

      name - The name of the switch
      description - The switch description
